title: HELP PLEASE
body: OK so i got the update and i agree and launch nothing new so as soon as i launch i wanna see the new animation nothing there so i thought maybe its a bug i login everything is like 3.2 stuff i cant open chats or friends list i can accept game invites help me please?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing issues connecting to certain services inside the client. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over a lot of the common solutions for this.

Let me know if this helps.
